column1: # warm-cache-prompts.tsv — Tool calls for warming server caches
# Lines starting with # are comments; blank lines are ignored.
# - compact: true is omitted from vocabulary-routed calls (it has no effect there)
# - Calls are ordered to maximise cache benefit: vocabulary searches first
#   (warm SQLite page cache), then details/images (warm HTTP response cache)
# Research scenario 3: technique adoption (Search API — compact works here)
# Research scenario 5: printmaking cities (revised — no creationDate)
# Research scenario 6: vanitas across media (revised — no creationDate)
# Research scenario 10: panel dimensions (revised — no creationDate)
# Research scenario 18: Leiden vs Haarlem painters
# Research scenario 24: Japanese prints (productionPlace:"Japan"+type:"print" already above)
# Requires v1.0+ DB (rights_uri column) — will error on v0.9
